body:
We are the Avicus' Community Newspaper. Our Goal: To spruce up the forums with news! :)
Staff:
Editor-in-Chief:Trident
Developer:jakesandobal
Trial-Staff:TheHoopsman, StormzInvader
We are currently looking for staff... APPLY! format below:
Skype:
Language Arts Grade:
Reason:
Time Zone:
Specialty:
Requirements-{must be active on both forums and server}
looking for:
writers
editors
take this test:
https://testmoz.com/347023

We have released 1 issue!
link:http://avicus.net/forums/3cdeee962

replies.body:
Skype: Fred Hawkins (a few may pop up, so its Fred Hawkins from Perth)
LA Grade: Man when you say LA grade do you mean like English or?
(Sorry it might be different where i live)
But for English my grades are somewhere around 7-8/10, which is how we mark it.
Reason: English is my absolute favourite subject, when I'm older, maybe even in a matter of a few years I've ALWAYS wanted to be a journalist, write novels, or produce other writing. But i also want to help the Avicus community to a phenomenal and serious level :)
Time Zone: Australian Western Standard Time (AWST)
I am heavily active in the game and am guaranteed on the forums at LEAST once or twice a day :)
